column5: Has a healthcare worker ever said that you have high blood pressure or hypertension?
column6: Have you ever taken medication for hypertension/high blood pressure?
column11: In which country were you born?
column13: What is your ethnic or tribal affiliation?
column14: What is your father's country of birth?
column15: What is your father's native language?
column16: What is your father's ethno-linguistic tribal affiliation?
column17: What is your mother's country of birth?
column18: What is your mother's native language?
column19: What is your mother's ethnic or tribal affiliation?
column20: Collection date of smoking status information
column21: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?
column22: How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes?
column23: Has a doctor or healthcare worker ever told you that you had kidney failure?
column24: If Yes, are one or both working well now?
column25: Are you currently on renal dialysis?
column26: On the days that you smoke, on average, how many cigarettes do you smoke? If you are a former smoker, on the days that you smoked, on average, how many cigarettes did you smoke?
column27: Have you ever had a kidney transplant?
column28: Over the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke? ,If you are a former smoker, on average, on how many days did you smoke in a month?
column29: Has anyone in your family either had kidney disease or died from it?
column30: Has a doctor ever told you that your kidneys have low function?
column31: Has a doctor or healthcare worker told you that you have a kidney disease?
column32: Have you been told you have/had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation?
column33: In your entire life, have you had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol? ,(not counting small tastes or sips)
column34: About how old were you when you first started drinking alcohol?, (not counting small tastes or sips)
column35: Have you got a permanet pacemaker inserted?
column36: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you drink one or more drinks of an alcoholic beverage?
column37: On the days that you drank during the past 30 days, how many drinks did you usually have each day?, (Count as a drink a can or bottle of beer; a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry; a shot of liquor or a mixed drink or cocktail).
column38: Has a doctor ever said you had rheumatic fever (inflammatory rheumatisim)?
column39: Were you ever told by a doctor or healthcare worker you had a stroke?
column40: Were you ever told by a doctor or healthcare worker you had a TIA, ministroke, or transient ischemic attack?
column41: Have you ever been tested for HIV?
column42: When did you have your most recent HIV  test?
column43: Are you currently on HIV treatment?
column45: Did you have surgery for this cancer?
column46: What kind of treatment did you have?
column47: Has a doctor or healthworker ever told you that you have tuberculosis (TB)?
column48: Has a doctor or healthworker ever told you that you have malaria?
column49: Has a doctor or healthworker ever told you that you have sleeping sickness?
